## Service.register() method

Lifecycle method: register

Signature:

```typescript
/** @virtual */
register?(app: Framework): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                      | Description                            |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| app       | [Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework) | [Framework](//bud-framework/framework) |

Returns:

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Remarks

Intended for [Service](/api/bud-framework/service) instances to register functionalities, modules, and bind functions and classes to the [Framework](//bud-framework/framework)
